eg.document

Class TextDocument

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.document.TextDocument

  • public final class TextDocument
extends java.lang.Object
    Class represents the text document which a file can be assigned to

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TextDocument(EditArea editArea)
      Creates a TextDocument
      TextDocument(EditArea editArea, Languages lang)
      Creates a TextDocument with a specified language.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextDocument

        public TextDocument(EditArea editArea)
        Creates a TextDocument
        Parameters:
        editArea - the reference to the EditArea

      • TextDocument

        public TextDocument(EditArea editArea,
                    Languages lang)
        Creates a TextDocument with a specified language.

        The language is overridden when a file is assigned.

        Parameters:
        editArea - the reference to an EditArea
        lang - the language that is one of the constants in Languages

      • isContentSaved

        public boolean isContentSaved()
        Returns:
        if the content of this text area equals the content since the last saving point

        Parameters:

      • enableTypeEdit

        public void enableTypeEdit(boolean isEnabled)
        Enables/disables syntax/keywords coloring and auto-indentation.
        Parameters:
        isEnabled - true to enable coloring and auto-indentation, false to disable. Enabling is possible if this language is not plain text.

      • textToBlack

        public void textToBlack(int length,
                        int pos)
        (Re-)colors the text starting at the specified position and spanning the specified length in the default color.
        Parameters:
        length - the length of text that is colored in the default color
        pos - the position where the text to color starts

        Parameters:

        public void removeStr(int start,
                      int length)
        Removes text from this document
        Parameters:

      • changeLanguage

        public void changeLanguage(Languages lang)
        Changes the language if no file has been set
        Parameters:
        lang - the language which has one of the constant values in Languages

      • colorSearchedText

        public void colorSearchedText(java.lang.String[] searchTerms,
                              boolean constrainWord)
        Colors in keyword color text elements specified by the array of search terms and turns on coloring during typing.

        Returns with a warning if the current language is not plain text.

        Parameters:
        searchTerms - the array of Strings that contain search terms
        constrainWord - true to color only words
